CustomSql.Name: Outcome Data
CustomSql.SqlQuery:
-- All offences leadeing the same outcome for same child on the same date: As 1 record
select distinct 
p.ypid,
y.yotoucode,
y.yot_name,
p.currentyotid,   
 p.pncnumber, 
CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end ) = '1' THEN 'Male'
WHEN (CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end ) = '2' then 'Female' else 'Unknown' end as Gender_Name,
CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end as Gender_Sex,
--CASE WHEN p.gender = '1' THEN 'Male' When p.gender = '2' then 'Female'
--else 'gendererror' end as gender,
 isnull(p.ethnicity,  'INFORMATION_NOT_OBTAINABLE') as ethnicity,

--ETH.Ethnicitygroup,

CASE WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Information not obtainable' THEN 'Not Known'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Other Ethnic Group' THEN 'Other'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Asian or Asian British' THEN 'Asian'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Black or Black British' THEN 'Black'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup IS NULL THEN 'Not Known' 
else ETH.Ethnicitygroup END AS Ethnicitygroup,

CASE WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Asian or Asian British' THEN 1
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Black or Black British' THEN 2
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup LIKE '%Mixed%' THEN 3
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup LIKE '%Other%' THEN 4
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'White' THEN 5
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Information not obtainable' then 6
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Not Known'  then 6
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup is null THEN 6 else 7 end as SortOrder,

 --p.date_of_birth::date,
--CAST(p.date_of_birth AS NVARCHAR) AS date_of_birth,
p.date_of_birth,

p.deleted,
P.originating_yot_person_id,
p.nationality,
p.religion, 
--o.offence_id,
--o.offence_date::date, 
--CAST(o.offence_date AS Date) AS offence_date_Date,
---CAST(o.offence_date AS NVARCHAR) AS offence_date,
--o.offence_description, 
--o.plea,

max(o.age_at_arrest_or_offence) as age_at_arrest_or_offence,  
max(o.age_at_first_hearing) as age_at_first_hearing, 
 --RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY p.ypid ORDER BY o.age_at_arrest_or_offence + o.age_at_first_hearing desc) as [AgeTotalFlag],
 
CASE WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2016-04-01' AND '2017-03-31' THEN '2016/17' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2017-04-01' AND '2018-03-31' THEN '2017/18' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2018-04-01' AND '2019-03-31' THEN '2018/19' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2019-04-01' AND '2020-03-31' THEN '2019/20' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2020-04-01' AND '2021-03-31' THEN '2020/21' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2021-04-01' AND '2022-03-31' THEN '2021/22' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2023-03-31' THEN '2022/23' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2023-04-01' AND '2024-03-31' THEN '2023/24' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2024-04-01' AND '2025-03-31' THEN '2024/25' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2025-04-01' AND '2026-03-31' THEN '2025/26' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2026-04-01' AND '2027-03-31' THEN '2026/27' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2027-04-01' AND '2028-03-31' THEN '2027/28' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2028-04-01' AND '2029-03-31' THEN '2028/29' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2029-04-01' AND '2030-03-31' THEN '2029/30' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2030-04-01' AND '2031-03-31' THEN '2030/31' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2031-04-01' AND '2032-03-31' THEN '2031/32' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2032-04-01' AND '2033-03-31' THEN '2032/33' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2033-04-01' AND '2034-03-31' THEN '2033/34' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2034-04-01' AND '2035-03-31' THEN '2034/35' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2035-04-01' AND '2036-03-31' THEN '2035/36' 
ELSE '' END AS [FinYear],



o.residence_on_legal_outcome_date,
--o.outcome_appeal_status,

CASE WHEN o.outcome_appeal_status = 'Appeal recording ambiguous' THEN '' ELSE o.outcome_appeal_status END AS outcome_appeal_status,




--o.yjb_offence_category,
--o.YJB_Seriousness_score,
--o.cms_legal_outcome, 
--datediff(year, p.date_of_birth,o.outcome_date) AS age_on_outcome_date,
--o.main_or_other, 
---o.is_substantive, 


--CASE WHEN m1.Mapping_Target_Boolean IS NOT NULL THEN m1.Mapping_Target_Boolean ELSE o.is_substantive end as is_substantive_fixed,
--CASE WHEN m2.Mapping_Target_Text = 'Diversion' then 'Diversions'
--WHEN m2.Mapping_Target_Text  IS NOT NULL THEN m2.Mapping_Target_Text ELSE isnull(o.legal_outcome_group,'') end as legal_outcome_group_fixed,
--CASE WHEN m3.Mapping_Target_Text IS NOT NULL THEN m3.Mapping_Target_Text ELSE o.legal_outcome end as legal_outcome_fixed,

o.legal_outcome,
 o.legal_outcome_group,
--CAST(outcome_date AS Date) as outcome_date_DATE,
--o.outcome_date,
--CAST(o.outcome_date AS NVARCHAR) AS outcome_date,
--day_date
--Year_Quarter_Name,
--Month_Name,


CASE WHEN Month_Name= 'April' then '01-April' WHEN Month_Name= 'May' then '02-May' WHEN Month_Name= 'June' then '03-June'
WHEN Month_Name= 'July' then '04-July' WHEN Month_Name= 'August' then '05-August' WHEN Month_Name= 'September' then '06-Sepetmber'
WHEN Month_Name= 'October' then '07-October' WHEN Month_Name= 'November' then '08-November' WHEN Month_Name= 'December' then '09-December'
WHEN Month_Name= 'January' then '10-January' WHEN Month_Name= 'February' then '11-February' WHEN Month_Name= 'March' then '12-March'
else NULL END AS Month_Name,






--Year_number,
--cast(year_number as nvarchar)+ '-' + cast((year_number + 1) as nvarchar) as Year_number,
--Year_number::text + left(Year_Quarter_Name,2) as Year_Quarter,
--to_char(o.outcome_date::timestamp with time zone, 'Mon-yyyy') AS outcome_month_year,
--(((p.ypid ||o.cms_legal_outcome) || to_char(o.outcome_date::timestamp with time zone, 'yyyy/MM/dd')) || ' 00:00:00.000') || rtrim(o.offence_id) as distinctlegaloutcomeid,
--o.outcome_appeal_status,
1 as Number

from yjb_case_reporting.mvw_yp_latest_record as l
inner join yjb_case_reporting.mvw_yp_person_details as p on p.source_document_id = l.source_document_id
inner join yjb_case_reporting.mvw_yp_offence as o on l.source_document_id = o.source_document_id
left join refdata.yotoucodes as y on y.yotoucode = p.yotoucode
left join refdata.ethnicity_group  as ETH on CAST(p.ethnicity AS NVARCHAR) = CAST(ETH.ethnicity AS NVARCHAR)

left join refdata.date_table as DT on o.outcome_date =  DT.day_date


Where legal_outcome_group in ('First-tier', 'Custody', 'Community', 'Pre-Court')
and o.residence_on_legal_outcome_date <> 'OTHER' 
and o.outcome_appeal_status <> 'Changed on appeal'

and o.age_at_arrest_or_offence >=10 and o.age_at_arrest_or_offence <=17
and o.age_at_first_hearing <=17
and o.outcome_date::date >= '2020-04-01'

--and o.legal_outcome_group = 'Community'
--and ETH.Ethnicitygroup like '%White%'
--and y.yot_name = 'Barking and Dagenham'



group by

p.ypid,
y.yotoucode,
y.yot_name,
p.currentyotid,   
 p.pncnumber, 

CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end ) = '1' THEN 'Male'
WHEN (CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end ) = '2' then 'Female' else 'Unknown' end ,
CASE WHEN p.gender is null and p.sex is not null then p.sex else p.gender 
end ,
 isnull(p.ethnicity,  'INFORMATION_NOT_OBTAINABLE'),

--ETH.Ethnicitygroup,

CASE WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Information not obtainable' THEN 'Not Known'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Other Ethnic Group' THEN 'Other'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Asian or Asian British' THEN 'Asian'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Black or Black British' THEN 'Black'
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup IS NULL THEN 'Not Known' 
else ETH.Ethnicitygroup END ,


CASE WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Asian or Asian British' THEN 1
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Black or Black British' THEN 2
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup LIKE '%Mixed%' THEN 3
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup LIKE '%Other%' THEN 4
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'White' THEN 5
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Information not obtainable' then 6
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup = 'Not Known'  then 6
WHEN ETH.Ethnicitygroup is null THEN 6 else 7 end,

--CAST(p.date_of_birth AS NVARCHAR) ,
p.date_of_birth,

p.deleted,
P.originating_yot_person_id,
p.nationality,
p.religion, 
 
CASE WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2016-04-01' AND '2017-03-31' THEN '2016/17' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2017-04-01' AND '2018-03-31' THEN '2017/18' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2018-04-01' AND '2019-03-31' THEN '2018/19' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2019-04-01' AND '2020-03-31' THEN '2019/20' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2020-04-01' AND '2021-03-31' THEN '2020/21' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2021-04-01' AND '2022-03-31' THEN '2021/22' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2023-03-31' THEN '2022/23' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2023-04-01' AND '2024-03-31' THEN '2023/24' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2024-04-01' AND '2025-03-31' THEN '2024/25' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2025-04-01' AND '2026-03-31' THEN '2025/26' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2026-04-01' AND '2027-03-31' THEN '2026/27' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2027-04-01' AND '2028-03-31' THEN '2027/28' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2028-04-01' AND '2029-03-31' THEN '2028/29' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2029-04-01' AND '2030-03-31' THEN '2029/30' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2030-04-01' AND '2031-03-31' THEN '2030/31' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2031-04-01' AND '2032-03-31' THEN '2031/32' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2032-04-01' AND '2033-03-31' THEN '2032/33' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2033-04-01' AND '2034-03-31' THEN '2033/34' 
WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2034-04-01' AND '2035-03-31' THEN '2034/35' WHEN o.outcome_date::date BETWEEN '2035-04-01' AND '2036-03-31' THEN '2035/36' 
ELSE '' END ,
o.residence_on_legal_outcome_date,
CASE WHEN o.outcome_appeal_status = 'Appeal recording ambiguous' THEN '' ELSE o.outcome_appeal_status END,
o.legal_outcome,
o.legal_outcome_group,
--Month_Name

CASE WHEN Month_Name= 'April' then '01-April' WHEN Month_Name= 'May' then '02-May' WHEN Month_Name= 'June' then '03-June'
WHEN Month_Name= 'July' then '04-July' WHEN Month_Name= 'August' then '05-August' WHEN Month_Name= 'September' then '06-Sepetmber'
WHEN Month_Name= 'October' then '07-October' WHEN Month_Name= 'November' then '08-November' WHEN Month_Name= 'December' then '09-December'
WHEN Month_Name= 'January' then '10-January' WHEN Month_Name= 'February' then '11-February' WHEN Month_Name= 'March' then '12-March'
else NULL END 



order by p.ypid
